segments.text: Can I be of any service to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been told that Chinese arts and crafts are famous for their excellent workmanship . We'd like to take some home . What would you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are over a thousands kinds of articles in our shop.For example , there is tricolored pottery originating in the Tang Dynasty , embroidery , batik , jade carving , just to name a few.Do you have anything in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not really.But I think it should be something distinctively Chinese . And easy to carry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would suggest you buy paper-cuts , embroidery and batik.They are very easy to carry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , we'd like to see some embroidery .
segments.speaker: S2
